title: A quackery with a difference--New medical pluralism and the
author: Wahlberg; Ayo
description: The figure of the 'miracle cure'-peddling quack pretending spectacular properties for worthless tonics is iconic. From their 19th century traveling wagon shows to their 21st century Internet spam scam
cleaned_text: quackery with a difference--New medical pluralism and the problem of 'dangerous practitioners' in the United Kingdom Download full text from publisher As the access to this document is restricted, you may want to [search](/cgi-bin/htsearch?q=%22A+quackery+with+a+difference++New+medical+pluralism+and+the+problem+of++dangerous+practitioners++in+the+United+Kingdom%22) for a different version of it.
